languages.text: "Мастер ван Калокс, ваше молчание сочится темно-багровым. Вы можете скрыть свою ярость от иных взоров, но не моего".
"Master van Calox, your silence oozes dark crimson. You may hide your rage from others, but not from my gaze."
languages.original_text: "Мастер ван Калокс, ваше молчание сочится темно-багровым. Вы можете скрыть свою ярость от иных взоров, но не моего".

traits.locale_text: "Master van Calox, your silence oozes dark crimson. You may hide your rage from others, but not from my gaze."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Master van Calox, your silence oozes dark crimson. You may hide your rage from others, but not from my gaze."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Master van Calox, your silence oozes dark crimson. You may hide your rage from others, but not from my gaze."

traits.locale_text: "Master van Calox, your silence oozes dark crimson. You may hide your rage from others, but not from my gaze."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “冯·卡洛克斯大师，你的沉默渗出了深红的色彩。你可以在别人面前隐藏你的愤怒，但瞒不过我的目光。”
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox, your silence oozes dark crimson. You may hide your rage from others, but not from my gaze."

traits.locale_text: “冯·卡洛克斯大师，你的沉默渗出了深红的色彩。你可以在别人面前隐藏你的愤怒，但瞒不过我的目光。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Votre silence est rouge sombre, maître van Calox. Vous pouvez très bien masquer vos véritables sentiments aux autres, mais à moi, vous ne pouvez rien cacher. »
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox, your silence oozes dark crimson. You may hide your rage from others, but not from my gaze."

traits.locale_text: « Votre silence est rouge sombre, maître van Calox. Vous pouvez très bien masquer vos véritables sentiments aux autres, mais à moi, vous ne pouvez rien cacher. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Maestro van Calox, su silencio rezuma un carmesí oscuro. Por mucho que oculte su ira a los demás, no escapa a mi vista».
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox, your silence oozes dark crimson. You may hide your rage from others, but not from my gaze."

traits.locale_text: «Maestro van Calox, su silencio rezuma un carmesí oscuro. Por mucho que oculte su ira a los demás, no escapa a mi vista».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「マスタ－・ヴァン・キャロックス、あなたの沈黙から暗い紅色が流れ出しています。他者にはその怒りを隠せるかもしれませんが、私の視線からは逃れられません」
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox, your silence oozes dark crimson. You may hide your rage from others, but not from my gaze."

traits.locale_text: 「マスタ－・ヴァン・キャロックス、あなたの沈黙から暗い紅色が流れ出しています。他者にはその怒りを隠せるかもしれませんが、私の視線からは逃れられません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Meister van Calox, aus Eurem Schweigen trieft dunkles Rot. Vor anderen könnt Ihr Euren Zorn verbergen, vor meinem Blick jedoch nicht."
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox, your silence oozes dark crimson. You may hide your rage from others, but not from my gaze."

traits.locale_text: "Meister van Calox, aus Eurem Schweigen trieft dunkles Rot. Vor anderen könnt Ihr Euren Zorn verbergen, vor meinem Blick jedoch nicht."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Master van Calox, your silence oozes dark crimson. You may hide your rage from others, but not from my gaze."

languages.text: "Üstat van Calox, sessizliğinizden koyu kızıllık sızıyor. Başkalarından saklayabildiğiniz öfkeniz, benim bakışlarımdan kaçamaz."
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox, your silence oozes dark crimson. You may hide your rage from others, but not from my gaze."

traits.locale_text: "Üstat van Calox, sessizliğinizden koyu kızıllık sızıyor. Başkalarından saklayabildiğiniz öfkeniz, benim bakışlarımdan kaçamaz."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
